title: Apple Vision Pro headset to go on sale early next month
text: MENU Tech giant’s new mixed-reality headset is eagerly awaited but comes with a hefty price tag Apple’s first major new product in nine years will arrive early next month, the company said on Monday, setting the stage for what the company hopes is a new era after the iPhone. The Apple Vision Pro — a $3,499 (€3,187 )mixed-reality headset — goes on sale in the US on February 2.  It will be available to preorder on the company’s website starting on January 19, Apple said in the announcement, which came  ...
